concept.title: Users Security Management
concept.shortdesc: Manage user security privileges on the User Administration page.

conbody.p: Only those UltiPro users you are qualified to see are available for you to add, view, update, reset, or delete.

ul.li: Add user accounts for existing employees

View user security information, as follows:
View user full name, user name, user type, account status, employment status, and default password
View user last logged on date and time
View additional security information for
Employee users
Guest users
Change user security status to Active or Suspended
Reset user passwords to the default
